creator: ellenmmoran

title: Can't get Thunderbird version 128 to install over 102.11.0 (64-bit) on Linux MInt 19.2
content:
Back in September, 2024, Microsoft Outlook no longer accepted my long-used login information via Thunderbird. I could still log in to https://outlook.live.com/owa/?realm=hotmail.com from the Firefox browser. I tried adjusting Account Settings (e.g. Server Name, Server Type [POP], Security/Authentication, etc. to no avail. I downloaded the current version of Thunderbird (128?) and tried installing per directions found here. Tried using the Flatpak path. The direct Command Line path yielded the same result.

dave@Sequimer:~$ sudo flatpak install flathub org.mozilla.Thunderbird [sudo] password for dave: Skipping: org.mozilla.Thunderbird/x86_64/stable is already installed

I've done a backup and moved to lesser machine which works but it is slow and I want to get back to the original configuration. Now I'm accumulating saved emails on this backup machine while prior emails are saved on the original machine. I'll want to merge them when the login problem is resolved.

Thanks in advance for your attention to this.
creator: diplomatdave88

title: In turning off Thunderbird,  what does the Lock function do?  Does it add more security  beyond Turn Off?
content: When turning off Thunderbird the choice are Off, Sleep and Lock. What does Lock do?

title: After windows 11 software update, Thunderbird can't log-in to my comcast account
content:
Update: Issue below solved. I have no idea how. Suddenly started working a couple of hours after first reporting though I did nothing after posting the original issue. All is good but I don't know why, how, what, or where!


I just did a routine windows 11 software update after which my emails on my Comcast account are suddenly not accessible by Thunderbird. Thunderbird loads fine but when I try to sync (or when Tbird automatically tries to sync) with Comcast, I get an error message box:

Login to server imap.comcast.net with username xxxxxxxxxxx@comcast.net failed

I don't know what to do to try to get Comcast to recognize and permit Thunderbird to resume normal operation.

I closed then re-opened my Tbird app and I got a popup to put in the comcast password which i did, however after doing so, I got another popup box with the following:

Mozilla Thunderbird ESR Thunderbird Alert from acccount xxxxxxxxxxxx@comcast.net: Temporarily blacklisted IP address -- try again later.

Any help greatly appreciated! Currently, my Tbird is nonfunctional.

Thanks!
creator: email4eric

But it doesn't seem to work through Thunderbird.

title: Calendar: Could not find definition for W. Australia Standard Time
content:
Hello,

I have the latest thunderbird (128.5.1esr (64-bit)), running on Windows 11 and connected to a mailcow server.

I am having problems with creating calendar events - they are created 1 hour in the future. They show up fine in thunderbird, but Mailcow/SOGo and mobile phones, etc all show the incorrect time.

If I create an event outside thunderbird, or edit it outside thunderbird, all is ok.

I have opened the error console, and it gives me a number of warnings "Calendar: Could not find definition for W. Australia Standard Time"

I am not sure where it is looking for this - but that is the timezone my computer is set to, it exists in the registry, etc.

There is an attached screenshot with more details of the error - maybe its java library issue or something?

Regards, Mal.
creator: mal8

title: Message Filters on Thunderbird 128.5.1 esr Nebula
content:
I used thunderbird since 2006 till now, but the present thunderbird was wrong somethings.

I used the imap mail on Thunderbird, and I created the Folder from lists below;

Profiles Email : xxx@xxx.xxx Inbox Drafts Sent Junk Trash Folder Banking Folder My Company 

             sub-folder Marketing                      sub-folder Marketing Managers                      sub-folder Marketing Staff              sub-folder Accounting                      sub-folder Accounting Managers                      sub-folder Accounting Staff              sub-folder Admin                      sub-folder Admin Managers                      sub-folder Admin Staff

Folder My Customer 

             sub-folder Company A                     sub-folder Accounting                     sub-folder Marketing              sub-folder Company B                     sub-folder Accounting                     sub-folder Marketing              sub-folder Company C                    sub-folder Accounting                    sub-folder Marketing

Folder My Supplier 

             sub-folder Company A                     sub-folder Accounting                     sub-folder Marketing              sub-folder Company B                     sub-folder Accounting                     sub-folder Marketing              sub-folder Company C                     sub-folder Accounting                     sub-folder Marketing

Folder My Third Party 

             sub-folder Company A                     sub-folder Accounting                     sub-folder Marketing              sub-folder Company B                    sub-folder Accounting                    sub-folder Marketing              sub-folder Company C                    sub-folder Accounting                    sub-folder Marketing

When I created the 25 message filters and run from inbox it's Work.

Example : Filters 1 Marketing Managers From contains : managers@xxx.xxx To contains : managers@xxx.xxx Move message to folder Marketing Managers under My Company and Marketing and sub-folder Marketing Managers

Filters 2 Marketing Customer Company A From contains : marketing@abc.xxx To contains : marketing@abc.xxx Move message to folder Marketing under My Customer and Company C and sub-folder Marketing But when I closed thunderbird and open again.

The alert pop-up will show about the filters can't move to destination folder. Then I'll check the filters again and found the problem with Perform these actions could not find the destination folder, I selected again and try to run It's work. After then I try again on next days. The alert pop-up display again.

Thunderbird 112, no message filters problem, but install new version (128.5.1 esr) found problem.

Anyone advice for solve or correct this problem.
creator: Aun_chino

title: Storing large amount of emails
content: I have a large amount of emails stored in a mail server (almost 22G), and the service will expire next month. So I want to use Thunder Bird to keep these emails in my local drive for later access. I am new to this software, and have a few questions. 1. Should I use IMAP or POP3 for my purpose? 2. Because it is a huge volume, I guess it may take several days to download all emails. Then, can I turn off Thunder Bird while it is downloading or pause the download process and resume later? What if the downloading process be interrupted due to internet disconnection, power failure or other reasons? Can the software resume where it leaves and ensure the integrity of all emails? Thank you for any help!
creator: yu_chen

title: setting up an email account that was already set up
content:
All the emails in one of my Thunderbird (TB)accounts deleted a total of over a hundred emails over time when Thunderbird (TB) closed. I still have 5 other TB accounts that are open. The other accounts do not delete the emails as my main account (MMA) does. The deleted emails did not go into another folder such as Deleted or Junk. The top of the MMA display states 100 plus emails are in MMA, but I cannot find or answer them. Question 1: Where are the emails and how can I recover them?

Secondly, now a new problem. A tech deleted MMA and tried to reinstall the MMA to recover the 100+ emails. He could not reinstate the MMA, nor can I. When we tried to reinstate MMA, it states “Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password.” It will not accept the only 2 passwords I have used. How can I change the password and reinstate MMA?

title: Lier une adresse e-mail sur trois ordinateurs
content:
Bonjour,

Je suis gérant d'une entreprise et je fais face à un problème de taille.

J'ai 2 salariés qui utilisent la même adresse e-mail, sur deux ordinateurs fixes différents.

Lorsqu'un des deux envois un e-mail, l'autre ne voit pas l'e-mail envoyé dans sa boîte d'envoi, ce qui veut dire qu'on ne sait pas si nous avons répondu à tel ou tel e-mail, ce qui devient compliqué au niveau de la communication. On peut répondre plusieurs fois à un même client.

Existe-il une solution pour lier le compte mail ce qui fais que chaque ordinateur peut voir les e-mails envoyés, les e-mails supprimés etc... sans se mettre en copie.

Merci d'avance Geoffrey DANGER
creator: dangergeoffrey

title: Setup an outlook.com mail account on thunderbird with oauth2
content: I attempt to setup an outh2 mail account for hotmail.com 1) Go settings (gear symbol lower left) Account settings, Account Actions, Add mail acount 2) Typa new and Email Address and click Configure manually 3) Select OAuth2 by both Authentification method Incoming and Outgoing server 4) click Re-test (test is incomplete so) 5) For outgoing server type smtp.outlook.com, 465 and SSL/TLS 6) The done button is grayed out, It is not possible to setup the account

title: Thunderbird freezes
content:
I'm running Thunderbird 128.5.1esr (64-bit) on Windows 10.

After it has been running for some time (usually half an hour), Thunderbird starts freezing up. It seems to be stuck at getting new messages from the server.

I can't close the window when writing a new message, I can't read e-mails and even closing Thunderbird doesn't work. I have to maually end the process in the task manager. CPU load and RAM are not affecter and all other programs on the computer work fine.

If I run Thunderbird in troubleshoot mode, these issues are not present. I have no active extensions (just one disabled), I'm using the default theme.

Any ideas what could be causing these issues or how to troubleshoot this?
creator: tk982

title: Messages automatically moved to Deleted Items and sync. mismatch with online mail account
content:
For a long time I'm having issues with messages in Inbox (and Junk Mail) are automatically moved to Deleted Items. It does not seem to be a fixed period of time. Sometimes it is 1 day sometimes more. The mail account is on an IMAP mail server (imap.pangia.biz). I have both Thunderbird on desktop and Thunderbird on mobile (previously K9) and that might even increase the issue frequency. Currently I started to loose some mails in Deleted Items as if they have been permanently deleted. However if I login to the web based online account I still can find the mails in trash folder.

Is this a known issue? How can I troubleshoot further? A sync. mismatch problem? Is the issue with my mail account provider how can I pinpoint the problem?
creator: alalhakim

title: Mail komt niet meer binnen/problemen met netwerktoegang of opslag
content:
Er komt geen mail meer binnen in Thunderbird. Onder in het scherm staat "mailservermogelijkheden controleren...' en daar blijft het bij. Ik dacht dat het te maken had met synchronisatie met GoogleDrive, die heb ik uitgezet (en computer herstart) maar dat heeft niet geholpen. Als ik een mail verstuur, kan die niet worden opgeslagen, dan krijg ik de melding dat er netwerkproblemen zijn of fouten met de bestandstoegang. Het is niet de internetverbinding, die werkt goed. Ik heb de profilemap al overschreven met een back-up, dat heeft ook niet geholpen. Ik hoop dat iemand een oplossing weet!

hartelijke groet, Marlies
creator: marlies.vanderwal
